00022 QWidget* ClockDriversDelegate::createEditor(QWidget* parent, 
00023                                                                                         const QStyleOptionViewItem& option, 
00024                                                                                         const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00025         // if clock name or clock source
00026         if (index.column() == 0 || index.column() == 1) {
00027 
00028                 QLineEdit* editor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00029                 connect(editor, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00030                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031                 return editor;
00032         }
00033 
00034         // if clock period, pulse offset or pulse duration
00035         else if (index.column() == 2 ||
00036                 index.column() == 4 || index.column() == 7) {
00037 
00038                         QDoubleSpinBox* editor = new QDoubleSpinBox(parent);
00039                         editor->setMinimum(0);
00040                         editor->setSingleStep(0.1);
00041                         connect(editor, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00042                                 this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00043                         return editor;
00044         }
00045 
00046         // if pulse value
00047         else if (index.column() == 6) {
00048 
00049                 QSpinBox* editor = new QSpinBox(parent);
00050                 editor->setMinimum(0);
00051                 editor->setMaximum(1);
00052                 editor->setSingleStep(1);
00053 
00054                 connect(editor, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00055                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00056                 return editor;
00057         }
00058 
00059         // if time unit
00060         else if (index.column() == 3 || index.column() == 5 || index.column() == 8) {
00061 
00062                 QComboBox* editor = new QComboBox(parent);
00063                 editor->addItem(QString("ns"));
00064                 editor->addItem(QString("ps"));
00065                 connect(editor, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00066                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00067                 return editor;
00068         }
00069         else {
00070                 return QStyledItemDelegate::createEditor(parent, option, index);
00071         }
00072 }

00074 void ClockDriversDelegate::setEditorData( QWidget* editor, 
00075                                                                                  const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00076 
00077         // if clock name or clock source
00078         if (index.column() == 0 || index.column() == 1) {
00079 
00080                 QLineEdit* lineEditor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00081                 QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00082                 lineEditor->setText(text);
00083         }
00084 
00085         // if clock period, pulse offset or pulse duration
00086         else if (index.column() == 2 ||
00087                 index.column() == 4 || index.column() == 7) {
00088 
00089                         QDoubleSpinBox* spinEditor = qobject_cast<QDoubleSpinBox*>(editor);
00090                         double value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toDouble();
00091                         spinEditor->setValue(value);
00092         }
00093 
00094         // if pulse value
00095         else if (index.column() == 6) {
00096 
00097                 QSpinBox* spinEditor = qobject_cast<QSpinBox*>(editor);
00098                 int value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toInt();
00099                 spinEditor->setValue(value);
00100         }
00101 
00102         // if time unit
00103         else if (index.column() == 3 || index.column() == 5 || index.column() == 8) {
00104 
00105                 QComboBox* comboEditor = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00106                 QString value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00107                 int index = comboEditor->findText(value);
00108                 comboEditor->setCurrentIndex(index);
00109         }
00110         else {
00111                 QStyledItemDelegate::setEditorData(editor, index);
00112         }
00113 }

00115 void ClockDriversDelegate::setModelData( QWidget* editor, 
00116                                                                                 QAbstractItemModel* model, 
00117                                                                                 const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00118 
00119         // if clock name or clock source
00120         if (index.column() == 0 || index.column() == 1) {
00121 
00122                 QLineEdit* lineEditor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00123                 QString text = lineEditor->text();
00124                 model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00125         }
00126 
00127         // if clock period, pulse offset or pulse duration
00128         else if (index.column() == 2 ||
00129                 index.column() == 4 || index.column() == 7) {
00130 
00131                         QDoubleSpinBox* spinEditor = qobject_cast<QDoubleSpinBox*>(editor);
00132                         double value = spinEditor->value();
00133                         model->setData(index, value, Qt::EditRole);
00134         }
00135 
00136         // if pulse value
00137         else if (index.column() == 6) {
00138 
00139                 QSpinBox* spinEditor = qobject_cast<QSpinBox*>(editor);
00140                 int value = spinEditor->value();
00141                 model->setData(index, value, Qt::EditRole);
00142         }
00143 
00144         // if time unit
00145         else if (index.column() == 3 || index.column() == 5 || index.column() == 8) {
00146 
00147                 QComboBox* comboEditor = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00148                 QString value = comboEditor->currentText();
00149                 model->setData(index, value, Qt::EditRole);
00150         }
00151         else {
00152                 QStyledItemDelegate::setModelData(editor, model, index);
00153         }
00154 }
00155 
00156 void ClockDriversDelegate::commitAndCloseEditor() {
00157 
00158         QSpinBox* spinBox = qobject_cast<QSpinBox*>(sender());
00159         QDoubleSpinBox* doubleSpin = qobject_cast<QDoubleSpinBox*>(sender());
00160         QComboBox* comboBox = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(sender());
00161         QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(sender());
00162         QWidget* widget = qobject_cast<QWidget*>(sender());
00163 
00164         if (comboBox) {
00165                 emit commitData(comboBox);
00166                 emit closeEditor(comboBox);
00167         }
00168         else if (doubleSpin) {
00169                 emit commitData(doubleSpin);
00170                 emit closeEditor(doubleSpin);
00171         }
00172         else if (spinBox) {
00173                 emit commitData(spinBox);
00174                 emit closeEditor(spinBox);
00175         }
00176         else if (lineEdit) {
00177                 emit commitData(lineEdit);
00178                 emit closeEditor(lineEdit);
00179         }
00180         else if (widget) {
00181                 emit commitData(widget);
00182                 emit closeEditor(widget);
00183         }
00184 }
